title: Le Grand Meaulnes
description: In a small village in the Sologne, Fifteen-year-old Fran√ßois Seurel narrates the story of his relationship with seventeen-year-old Augustin Meaulnes. Impulsive, reckless and heroic, Meaulnes embodies the romantic ideal, the search for the unobtainable, and the mysterious world between childhood and adulthood.
author: Alain-Fournier
